episode_event_general_matsubusa_aogiri/6: Wow! Is that Pokémon what I think it is?
Whoa! That’s so cool!
Wait, this isn’t what I came here for!

I have to get back to the Pokémon Center and
let Trista know what’s going on!

Hello! I’ve just received some important
information from May and Brendan.
You’re not gonna believe this, but I saw Kyogre!
And I found Groudon!

Since they’re both Legendary Pokémon, we thought
it best to come here quick and report what we
saw before it’s too late!

We’re not sure what caused these two Legendary
Pokémon to appear, so we’re requesting an
official survey of where they were spotted.

We’d like to confirm what’s going on and make
sure those areas are safe.

I apologize for the inconvenience, but as a safety
precaution, please avoid visiting the beach and
volcano areas.
Aw man! So we can’t go back?

I hope it doesn’t take too long for them to figure
out if it’s safe or not...

I know! If all they need is someone to sneak over
and check things out, we could probably do
that ourselves!

Good idea! Hey, why don’t you join us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Yeah! I’d feel a lot better if you came with us, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

This sure escalated
quickly, huh...

The super-ancient Pokémon Groudon
and Kyogre...

They’re both extremely powerful, if I
remember right.
Come on! Let’s go check it out!
